questions.text: Please select your state or province from the list below?
questions.description: While the survey is anonymous, to assist in gathering data that can be used at a State or Provincial level, we would like to capture the state your PSAP is located in. This will be the only time that you are asked for this information and this is the only identifier that you will be asked to provide. Since this is one question, this survey will only take a minute to complete.

questions.text: What is the base population serviced by the PSAP?
questions.description: This question helps us understand the size of the population your PSAP serves. Please select the range that best represents your base population. This information will likely be sourced from your local governing body.

questions.text: What is the peak population serviced by the PSAP?
questions.description: This question helps us understand how population swell impacts the size of the population your PSAP serves. Please select the range that best represents your peak population. This information will likely be sourced from your local governing body.

questions.text: What are most common factors contributing to the population variation?
questions.description: This question will help us understand what factors drive the temporary population changes. These can be used to make recommendations in staffing models to account for these fluctuations. This information will likely be sourced from your local governing body.

questions.text: Select the PSAP classification?
questions.description: We are asking this to see the distribution of Primary and Secondary PSAPs. We recognize that staffing and processing standards will change based on that classification.

questions.text: What services does the PSAP provide? (Please select all that apply):
questions.description: This question helps us understand the range of services your PSAP provides.

questions.text: Does the PSAP provide any additional services beyond the ones listed in question 6?
questions.description: We recognize that the service list above is not comprehensive. This question allows us to identify if your PSAP provides additional services beyond the standard offerings.

questions.text: Please list any additional services that you provide?
questions.description: Listing the additional services you provide will assist in the development of better models and guidelines by accounting for non-standard services.

questions.text: How many hours per week are spent on these additional services?
questions.description: Understanding the number of hours spent on these additional services will help us assess their impact on your center's workload.

questions.text: What is the PSAP operational governance?
questions.description: This question helps us understand the governance structure under which your PSAP operates.
options: Federal Government (Airport, Tribal, LEO, Miliary, Other)

questions.text: Which specific agencies fall under this governance:

anyOf: Federal Government (Airport, Tribal, LEO, Miliary, Other)

sections.title: Training, Quality Assurance, and Personnel Development

questions.text: How long is your training program for new telecommunicators?
How many hours per week are dedicated to training?
Do you have a dedicated training staff?
If so, how many staff are dedicated to training?
How many telecommunicators are trainers?
How many hours per week do they spend training new telecommunicators?
Do you have a continuing education/continuous training program?
How many hours per week are spent in continuing education/continuous training?
Do you have AI assistance in QA/QI?
If so, how many hours per week are dedicated to QA/QI?
Name of CAD vendor
Name of Phone vendor
